NDSH
Table of Contents

Namespace NDSH.Geospatial.Gml.Measures

Classes

AngleChoiceType

Represents the GML AngleChoiceType as defined by GML specification. This type has been marked as deprecated (obsolete) in the underlying schema.
It provides a choice between specifying an angle as a single numeric measurement AngleType or as a degrees-minutes-seconds representation DMSAngleType.

AngleType

Represents the GML AngleType as defined by GML specification. This type extends MeasureType to handle angular measurements (e.g., bearing, azimuth, or other rotational values), storing a numeric angle value and its unit of measure.

AreaType

Represents the GML AreaType from the GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to store area measurements, typically including a numeric value and a unit of measure.

DMSAngleType

Represents a deprecated GML DMSAngleType, storing an angle in degrees-minutes-seconds format. Inherits from ObservableDbEntity to track property changes and database persistence details.

DegreesType

Represents a deprecated GML DegreesType, storing a numeric degree measurement in the range of 0â€“359, plus an optional directional attribute (N, E, S, W, +, -).

GridLengthType

Represents the GML GridLengthType as defined by GML specification. This type extends MeasureType to describe grid spacing or resolution dimensions within a geospatial context.

LengthType

Represents the GML LengthType as defined by GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to store length measurements, typically expressed as a numeric value plus a mandatory unit of measure (uom).

MeasureType

Represents the GML MeasureType as defined in GML specification. This class stores a numeric Value measurement along with a mandatory UnitOfMeasure identifier.

ScaleType

Represents the GML ScaleType from the GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to handle scale or ratio measurements, typically dimensionless values with an optional unit of measure.

SpeedType

Represents the GML SpeedType as defined by GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to store speed measurements, typically expressed as a distance per unit time (e.g., meters per second).

TimeType

Represents the GML TimeType from the GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to handle time-based measurements, typically indicating durations or intervals in a specified unit of measure (e.g., seconds, minutes, hours).

VolumeType

Represents the GML VolumeType from the GML specification. This class extends MeasureType to capture volume measurements, typically expressed as cubic units of measure (e.g., cubic meters).

Interfaces

IAngle

Defines a contract for GML angle representations within geospatial metadata. Classes implementing this interface can store angular measurements (e.g., latitude, longitude, bearing) along with relevant unit-of-measure details, consistent with the GML specification.

Enums

DegreesTypeDirection

Enumerates the directional or sign indicators applicable to a DegreesType measurement. This reflects the cardinal (N, E, S, W) or sign (+, -) choices specified in the deprecated GML DegreesType.

MinutesSecondsValueType

Specifies how the minute and second portions of a degrees-minutes-seconds (DMS) angle are stored or interpreted within a GML context. This enumeration allows for either a single decimal value for minutes or separate integer fields for minutes and seconds.
